author: ci70
body:
Hi!

How would one update PowerShell through command line? Can it be done through cURL?

Thanks.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Depends on the OS, follow the instructions per OS in [README.md](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell#get-powershell).  If Windows, there is a [installer proposal](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-RFC/pull/97) in the works and open for feedback

title: Update
